SEARCH
Package Characters

Class JackBomber

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Characters.JackBomber
public class JackBomber extends Character
Description:

Represents the main player character, JackBomber. Handles movement, sprite animation, collision detection, bomb placement, score management, level time tracking, and interaction with game elements like enemies and tiles.

Author:
mguzelocak, Zelele

      Increases the player's score by the specified amount.

      Decreases the player's score by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of points to subtract from the current score

      Returns the current score of the player.
      Returns:

      Renders the player sprite on the screen.
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics context to draw on

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Applies damage to the player, reducing health if not currently invincible. Triggers game over if health reaches zero.

    • getSpriteBounds

      public Rectangle getSpriteBounds()
      Returns the actual bounds of the character sprite used for collision detection.
      Returns:
      the sprite bounds rectangle adjusted to the current position

    • getPlayerHealth

      public int getPlayerHealth()
      Gets the current health of the player.
      Returns:
      number of remaining hearts

    • getRemainingTime

      public long getRemainingTime()
      Gets the remaining time for the current level.
      Returns:
      remaining time in milliseconds

    • setRemainingTime

      public void setRemainingTime(long remainingTime)
      Sets the remaining time for the current level. This is used to update the level countdown timer shown to the player.
      Parameters:
      remainingTime - the remaining time in milliseconds
